data.name: Travel to GolemPark
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST NOW!



About the Game


Travel to GolemPark is an adventure Point & Click game that tells the story of the boy Mick, who receives winning tickets to the robot festival. And gathers friends for a trip. The game will take you through different areas of a futuristic city in which robots perform important tasks. On the way, the main character meets various obstacles from a harsh father to a breakdown of transport.

  • In addition to the classic control with the left and right mouse buttons, a double click on items in the inventory has been added, changing their state.

  • The action takes place in the near future in a parallel universe where robotics is developed.
  • All graphics in the game are drawn by hand.

data.short_description: A classic adventure quest, in the setting of an alternative future. Help the main character gather friends and go on a trip to the festival.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible.
